articles.description: Paytm has seen good growth in lending and other businesses. This has raised the confidence of some brokerage houses prompting them to give it a buy rating at a target price of over INR1,000. While there is optimism that the company will turn profitable in six…
articles.content: SynopsisPaytm has seen good growth in lending and other businesses. This has raised the confidence of some brokerage houses prompting them to give it a buy rating at a target price of over INR1,000. … [+148 chars]

articles.author: Twesh Mishra
articles.title: Centre notifies new vehicle insurance rates - Economic Times
articles.description: These revised rates will be applicable from June 1, 2022. These rates were last revised for financial year 2019-20 and were kept unchanged during the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content: The centre on Wednesday approved the new base premium rates for third party motor vehicle insurance. These revised rates will be applicable from June 1, 2022. These rates were last revised for financ… [+1915 chars]
